t: Amazon | Dungeons & Dragons Lore Wiki | Fandom
s: Amazons have made a few appearances in D&D, typically as the archetypal warrior-women based loosely on Greek legend. They have been depicted largely as outsiders to the typical campaign world (presumed to be the male-dominated pseudo-European medieval stereotype), and thus often under-estimated.
